articles.title: Fallout: Season 2 Blu-Rays Are Already Up For Preorder
articles.title_tr: Fallout: Season 2 Blu-Rays Are Already Up For Preorder
articles.summary: Fallout: Complete Second Season Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K)                                                                                            $48 | Release date TBD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Preorder at Amazon                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Fallout: Complete Second Season Standard Edition                                                                                            $35 | Release Date TBD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Preorder at Amazon (4K)                                                                                                                                                                           Preorder at Amazon (Blu-ray)                                                                                                                                                                           Preorder at Amazon (DVD)                                                                    Fallout: Season Two recently wrapped on Prime Video, and, like clockwork, a 4K Blu-ray containing all eight episodes is up for preorder. There's no release date yet for the $48 4K steelbook, but Amazon has opened up preorders for it alongside the upcoming standard Blu-ray and DVD release of the show.                                                                                                        Fallout: Complete Second Season Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K)                                                                $48 | Release date TBD                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Fallout: Complete Second Season Limited-Edition Steelbook cover art features the core trio of Lucy, the Ghoul, and Maximus overlooking the blasted landscape of New Vegas, with a menacing, mutant-shaped cloud hanging overhead. This cover art is exclusive to the Limited-Edition Steelbook 4K Blu-ray.Bonus features haven't been revealed yet, but we're expecting this release to take a few cues from the Fallout: Season One Blu-ray release, which included a collection of behind-the-scenes featurettes. We'll update this post once the Fallout: Complete Second Season special features have been listed.                                                        Preorder at Amazon                                                                                                                                                                                   Fallout: Complete Second Season Standard Edition                                                                $35 | Release Date TBD                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Along with the Steelbook 4K Blu-ray version, Fallout: Complete Second Season will also launch in a standard edition on 4K Blu-ray, standard Blu-ray, and DVD. As with the Steelbook version, no release date or special features have been announced, but it's safe to assume the standard edition will launch on the same day and likely include the same bonus materials. Preorders are available at Amazon.                                                        Preorder at Amazon (4K)                                                                                                                            Preorder at Amazon (Blu-ray)                                                                                                                                                Preorder at Amazon (DVD)                                                         Speaking of the first Fallout season, you can also pick up the Blu-ray and DVD for it at a great price. The steelbook edition has been out of stock for a while, but the 4K version is on sale for $35 (was $40), and the DVD is $20 (was $25).Fallout: Season One Blu-rays4K Blu-ray -- $35 ($40)Blu-ray -- $38.17DVD -- $20 ($25)Several big video games have been adapted into live-action TV series recently, and if you're looking to build a Blu-ray library around them, there are plenty of options to choose from. HBO's The Last of Us series is considered to be the gold standard, while Twisted Metal is a surprisingly well-crafted spin on the cult-classic road-rage racing games. Halo also made it to TV, and both seasons are available on Blu-ray.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Bigfoot Has Been Found, And He's In Fallout 76
articles.title_tr: Bigfoot Has Been Found, And He's In Fallout 76
articles.summary: Few cryptids are better known than Bigfoot, and we know where he's going to be at the beginning of next month. Bethesda has teased the arrival of Bigfoot in the next season of Fallout 76 with a teaser video that resembles supposed real-world attempts to catch the creature on camera.Bigfoot is coming to a wasteland near you! The Backwoods update and Season 24 arrives March 3 in #Fallout76 pic.twitter.com/38m0Y22rcB  â€” Fallout (@Fallout) February 17, 2026              Bigfoot will be a part of the Backwoods update when Fallout 76 Season 24 begins on March 3. However, this won't be Bigfoot's first appearance in the game. Bigfoot's footprints have been spotted in the Burning Springs update, and the character has randomly spawned during public events in the game. Judging from the video teaser, it appears Bigfoot will be more prominently featured going forward.Fallout 76 already has a large assortment of cryptids in the game, including the Jersey Devil, Mothman, Wendigo, Sheepsquatch, Blue Devil, and the Smiling Man. Since players can battle those creatures, it stands to reason that Bigfoot will be available as a miniboss fight as well.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.summary: The upcoming live-action Sonic the Hedgehog 4 movie has landed a noteworthy television and film star for a key role, casting Kristen Bell as the hammer-wielding pink hedgehog Amy Rose.Per The Hollywood Reporter, Bell, who is best known for her lead roles in The Good Place, Veronica Mars, and Frozen, has closed a deal to join the cast of the sequel, which is scheduled for a March 2027 release date. And I could not be more excited!!!
